synthetic-media.name: Synthetic Media & Declarations
synthetic-media.purpose: Neutral recording of declarations relating to AI-assisted, synthetic, or composite digital artefacts without classification or judgement.
synthetic-media.non_claims: Does not detect, classify, validate, or assess synthetic media, nor provide authenticity judgements.

autoevidence.name: AutoEvidence
autoevidence.purpose: Structured evidentiary intake and chronological recording for compliance, dispute readiness, and institutional documentation workflows.
autoevidence.non_claims: Does not determine admissibility, truth, or legal sufficiency of recorded evidence.

evidexia.name: Evidexia
evidexia.purpose: Vertical-specific compliance and documentation workflows built on the TrustOrigin neutral registry infrastructure.
evidexia.non_claims: Does not certify compliance, issue regulatory determinations, or replace professional judgement.

escrow.name: Neutral Escrow Ledger
escrow.purpose: Chronological custody and declarative escrow without adjudication.
escrow.non_claims: Does not certify, enforce outcomes, adjudicate disputes, or provide legal judgement.

research.name: Research & Academic Registry
research.purpose: Chronological registration of research artefacts, methodologies, datasets, and declarations for academic and public-interest use.
research.non_claims: Does not peer-review, validate findings, or assess scientific merit.
